item.title: OpenGL in Python with PyOpenGL
item.description: Installation for Ubuntu based OS Requirements Python 3 python3-pip Open the terminal Update the system sudo apt-get update For PyOpenGL packages pip3 install PyOpenGL PyOpenGL_accelerate For freeglut sudo apt-get install libglu1-mesa-dev freeglut3-dev mesa-common-dev To check the installation Open a new python file

item.title: Intro_To_Web_Development

item.title: About
